exportrecoverykey.title: Download your recovery key
exportrecoverykey.subtitle1: You will need this if you have forgotten your password or lost your Authenticator.
exportrecoverykey.subtitle2a: If you lose this recovery key and forget your password
exportrecoverykey.subtitle2b: all your files will be inaccessible, even by CyberDoc.
exportrecoverykey.subtitle3: You must download you key before continue

twofactor.twofactor_qr_code_computer: Please use your 2FA app (such as Authy) to scan this QR code and get a code
twofactor.twofactor_qr_code_mobile: Please use your 2FA app (such as Authy) to get a code
twofactor.twofactor_sms: Please type your phone number to receive a code via SMS
twofactor.twofactor_enter_code: Or enter this code into your authentication app
twofactor.enter_token_app: Enter token generated on your application
twofactor.enter_token_sms: Enter token received on your phone
twofactor.use_code_from_app: Use token generated by an app
twofactor.too_many_sms_sent_error: Too many SMS sent. Please wait ten minutes then retry
twofactor.two_many_invalid_codes_error: Too many invalid codes sent. Please wait ten minutes then retry

tags.another_tag_with_same_name_exists: Another tag with the same name already exists

accounts.email_already_exists: A user with this email already exists
accounts.use_recovery_code: Can't access to your two-factor device?

accounts.password_restrictions: Use at least eight characters with uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols.

settings.password_card_subtitle: Set a unique password to protect your personal CyberDoc account.
settings.two_factor_card_subtitle: Require a key in addition to your password.

export_data.title: Download your personal data
export_data.subtitle: This will provide your account data, not the actual files stored by you.

general.error_content: An error occured. Please check your Internet connection, then refresh the page.
general.share_error_already_logged: You cannot share a file with yourself
general.password_recovery_mail: Please indicate your account email so that we can send you a link to recover your password :
general.email_sended: If an account exist with this adress, it will receive shortly a mail with all indication on how to recover your password.
general.password_resetted: Your password has been reset, you can now go back to the login page.
